ygData.subject: Re: the pic of that guy with the gun
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And where do we get this emulator? ;) ... Heh.  I think it s just you and I... and since we re the most obnoxious, ya know. =====
ygData.messageBody:
> It is a hack job... whoever made the emuQ are the only guys in the world to
> ever make an everquest emulator. They can give any item different
> attributes, as well as create new classes and levels.. (The guy shown is a
> high elf shadownight at lvl 100)
> They can also place enimies wherever they want.. etc

And where do we get this emulator? ;)

> (what's with all the Bertoxx gnomes on his board anyway? =)
> I picked Bertoxx as my server because it has two X's and X's are cool
> looking =)

Heh. I think it's just you and I... and since we're the most obnoxious, ya
know.


=====
